title: Minimum Window Substring
description: Given two strings s and t of lengths m and n respectively, return the minimum window substring of s such that every character in t (including duplicates) is included in the window. If there is no such substring, return the empty string "". The testcases will be generated such that the answer is unique.

examples.explanation: The minimum window substring "BANC" includes 'A', 'B', and 'C' from string t.

constraints: s and t consist of uppercase and lowercase English letters.

steps.instruction: Define the function min_window that takes s and t.

steps.hint: Iterate through all substrings using nested loops.

optimal.name: Sliding Window
optimal.description: Expand right, shrink left when valid.

steps.instruction: Define the function min_window that takes s and t.

steps.hint: Return the substring or empty string.
steps.solutionCode:
l, r = res
    return s[l : r + 1] if resLen != float("inf") else ""
